title: Still no transfer?
body: 8.2 Is out but still no transfers

replies.body: They'll still be back with 8.2, but they couldn't be turned on until all regions had fully patched. They also wanted to test it to make sure everything was working correctly of course, wouldn't be right to rush it and then something go wrong xD!
But Broporo all the regions are already patched and they still arent on its 12 am here ima be pissed if i wake up in a few hours and they arent on
OH DAMN you got me riot! guess il wait another 4 and a half months! correction :years!
people have been saying all the servers need to be patched to 8.2 i went on every serer and all of them are 8.2 and still nothing.
get it while you cant kek
